TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISoapClientImport

summary.span: 导入经过身份验证的、加密的 SOAP 客户端代理。

span.span: Imports authenticated, encrypted SOAP client proxies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅的默认实现。See for the default implementation. 由.NET Framework 内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要在代码中直接使用它。You do not need to use it directly in your code.

public: void ProcessClientTlbEx(System::String ^ progId, System::String ^ virtualRoot, System::String ^ baseUrl, System::String ^ authentication, System::String ^ assemblyName, System::String ^ typeName);

param.name: progId

span.span: The programmatic identifier of the class.

param.span: 如果是空字符串 ("")，此方法将不执行任何操作就返回。

span.span: If an empty string (""), this method returns without doing anything.
The name of the virtual root.

param.name: baseUrl

span.span: The base URL that contains the virtual root.

param.name: authentication
param.span: 要使用的 ASP.NET 身份验证的类型。

span.span: The type of ASP.NET authentication to use.

summary.span: 创建 .NET 远程处理客户端配置文件，该文件包括安全和身份验证选项。

span.span: Creates a .NET remoting client configuration file that includes security and authentication options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为完整的 URL 是 HTTPS，并且不提供身份验证，身份验证设置为`Windows`。If the for the full URL is HTTPS and authentication is not provided, authentication is set to `Windows`.

exception.span: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
